title: Refund
body: Hey, i just bought Vayne with RP a day or two ago and now she's on sale. Can i please have a 440 RP refund? Thanks. (To Riot)

replies.body:
Pretty sure they made an announcement saying that you can't do this anymore.

They also said they'd be announcing exactly when sales are going on, but that's been pretty inconsistent.
Ahh, thanks for the notification, never knew haha.
